mapper.insert: insert into products(s_category, s_name, s_price, s_description, s_fileName) values(#{category}, #{name}, #{price},#{description}, #{fileName})
mapper.update: update products set s_category = #{category}, s_name = #{name}, s_description = #{description}, s_price = #{price}, s_fileName = #{fileName} where s_name = #{s_name} ;
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from products where s_name = #{name}
